64842.summary: Some customers in Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64842.title: July 30 - Fort McMurray | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
